CommandInfos.Name: LE
Description:
Use !LE to display, set, or change LE value

 !LE      Display values
 !LE 30   Set LE to 30
 !LE 30   Set LE to 30
 !LE +5   Increment LE by 5 (up to the maximum)
 !LE ++5  Increment LE by 5 (ignoring the maximum)
 !LE -5   Decrease LE by 5

CommandInfos.Name: AE
Description:
Use !AE (or !Asp) to display, set, or change AE/Asp value

 !AE      Display values
 !AE 30   Set Asp to 30
 !AE +5   Increment Asp by 5 (up to the maximum)
 !AE ++5  Increment Asp by 5 (ignoring the maximum)
 !AE -5   Decrease Asp by 5 (down to 0)
